RelatedSentence: Magnolia High School Students Sarah Swift and Brianna Bennick attended the Business Professionals of America ( BPA ) 2014 National Leadership Conference , Accelerate Your Future , in Indianapolis , April 30 - May 4 .

Magnolia High School chapter members , Sarah Swift and Brianna Bennick joined more than 5,000 other conference delegates and 1,000 chapters from across the nation to participate in national level business skills competitions , workshops , and general sessions .

Magnolia High School chapter members , Sarah Swift and Brianna Bennick joined more than 5,000 other conference delegates and 1,000 chapters from across the nation to participate in national level business skills competitions , workshops , and general sessions .
Besides having the opportunity to excel , they experienced the city of Indianapolis , IN .

The conference is the culmination of a school year 's worth of business education and training which members of the local chapter of Business Professionals of America at Magnolia High School have received , said chapter advisor , Edith Passmore .

Bennick competed in Accounting using QuickBooks and Swift competed in Fundamental Word Processing skills .
Business Professionals of America acts as a cohesive agent in the nationwide networking of education and business and industry .
